synonyms.synonym: G-protein coupled receptor for asthma susceptibility

protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: May be active in signaling pathway in an autocrine or paracrine fashion in several tissues. Receptor for neuropeptide S, it may mediate its action, such as inhibitory effects, on cell growth. Involved in pathogenesis of asthma and other IgE-mediated diseases

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
